daily.title: How to order coffee
daily.target: Hi! I would like a coffee, please.
daily.target_no: Hei! Jeg vil gjerne ha en kaffe, takk.
daily.description: Practice ordering a coffee. Focus on /r/ and polite tone.

daily.title: Introduce yourself
daily.description: Say your name clearly with correct stress.

daily.title: Ask for directions
daily.target: Excuse me, where is the train station?

daily.title: Thank someone
daily.target: Thank you very much for your help!

daily.title: Order food
daily.prompt: Order a meal at a restaurant
daily.target: I would like the salmon, please.
daily.target_no: Jeg vil gjerne ha laksen, takk.
daily.description: Practice ordering food with clear pronunciation.

weekly.title: Order a coffee IRL
weekly.description: Go to a café and order a coffee in Norwegian. Record a short debrief.
weekly.target_no: Gå til en kafé og bestill en kaffe på norsk.

weekly.title: Have a short conversation
weekly.description: Have a 2-minute conversation in Norwegian about your day.
weekly.target_no: Ha en 2-minutters samtale på norsk om dagen din.

monthly.title: Talk about the weather
monthly.description: Have a 1-minute chat with someone about the weather in Norwegian. Reflect on it.
monthly.target_no: Snakk om været på norsk i 1 minutt.

monthly.title: Introduce yourself to a new person
monthly.description: Meet someone new, introduce yourself in Norwegian, and ask one follow-up question.
monthly.target_no: Møt noen nye, presenter deg selv på norsk, og still ett oppfølgingsspørsmål.
